description: Ground defines the main surface of the web scene, based on elevation layers.
title: Ground

___layers.description: An array of elevationLayer objects defining the elevation of the ground in the web scene.

$eref.description: ElevationLayer is a tile layer used for rendering elevation in web scenes.
$eref.title: elevationLayer

___visibility.description: Boolean property determining whether the layer is initially visible in the web scene.

___url.description: The URL to the layer.If the layer is not from a web service but rather a feature collection, then the url property is omitted

___listMode.description: To show or hide the elevation layer in the layer list

___title.description: A user-friendly string title for the layer that can be used in a table of contents. If this is not included, a title is derived from the service.

___id.description: A unique identifying string for the layer

___itemId.description: Optional string containing the item ID of the service if it's registered on ArcGIS Online or your organization's portal.
